title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Justice) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister justice) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Patrick Cluskey, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed as Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Justice, with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 patrick cluskey particular whose address deposited office department justice appointed special adviser minister justice effect 9 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed as Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Justice, for the period from 9 April 2024 to 26 April 2024.
text_norm: 3 caroline murphy particular whose address deposited office department justice appointed special adviser minister justice period 9 april 2024 26 april 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 4. Cliona Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
4. Cliona Doyle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed as Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Justice, with effect from 29 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
16 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [359] 3
